author: Xbox
description:
Apartment No. 129 is a first-person psychological horror inspired by a real event that occurred in Turkey in 2009. Two young girls allegedly performed satanic rituals in an apartment building. That same night, they mysteriously lost their lives. Residents reported a violent earthquake, shattered windows, and terrifying phenomena — yet no earthquake was officially recorded. Years later, the building was abandoned. Emir, a content creator obsessed with paranormal events, enters the cursed Apartment No. 129 to uncover the truth. What awaits him inside is far beyond his expectations. Explore the abandoned building, read notes, manage inventory, face terrifying entities, and survive a horror experience with multiple endings.

https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n7n7606ch70
